content: learn how to create pepe the panda amigurumi with this free panda bear crochet pattern this is an easy almost no sew crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini panda bear from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger panda from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video tutorial included on how to make this cute panda bear amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-panda-crochet-pattern/ link to video https //youtu be/-ig7i9zmkmu
